name: Filter Effect Soft Radiance Concealer
about: What it is: This hydrating, radiant concealer flexes to brighten, conceal, and sculpt a full range of skin tones with high-performance ingredients....Coverage: Medium..Finish: Radiant..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hyaluronic Acid: Provides a powerful, skin-smoothing moisture boost..- Pomegranate seed extract: Provides Brightening..What Else You Need to Know:.-Hydrates and nourishes .-Sweatproof, transfer-resistant, and water-resistant.-Longwearing.-Great for all skin types.-Ophthalmologist tested.-Noncomedogenic
ingredients: Water(Aqua, Eau), Isohexadecane, Isododecane, Dimethicone, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Butylene Glycol, C13-15 Alkane, Glycerin, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone  Crosspolymer, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Sodium Chloride, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Phenoxyethanol, Tribehenin, Polysilicone-11, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Maltodextrin, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Punica Granatum Seed Extract, Propylene Carbonate, Alpinia Galanga Extract, Pentylene Glycol, Trisodium EDTA, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate.May Contain/Peut Contenir:Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).

shades.shade_descriptor: light medium with slightly peach undertones
light medium with slightly golden undertones
medium tan with slightly peach undertones
deep tan with rich golden undertones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: what the freaky deaky. the colour is much more yellow than it says it is, also its super hard to blend. it became super cakey after i put on my setting powder and actually started coming off.
this is my go to concealer. it's super easy to apply and super smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shade is a bit to orange for my liking but overall it feels very light on your skin and smooth though doesn't have very good coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: it is not full coverage but i am still happy with the concealer, it works really well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for a couple weeks, and it is wonderful! Normally when I first use a new product I break out, but with this I didn't and I think itâ€™s because of the hylauronic acid in it. Overall, I would definitely recommend buying this product.
